member.name: T:STARS.StarsInterface
member.remarks: This class is used to talk with Stars Server.

member.summary: Used to indicate the nodename of Stars client.

member.name: F:STARS.StarsInterface.svrHost
member.summary: Used to indicate the Stars Server hostname. (default: 'localhost')

member.name: F:STARS.StarsInterface.svrPort
member.summary: Used to indicate the Stars Server portno. (default: 6057)

member.name: F:STARS.StarsInterface.keyFile
member.summary: Used to indicate the certification keyfile's name. (default: 'nodeName'.key)
